meta.scrape_notes: Full index captured (104 weeks). Individual demo detail captured for select weeks where full content was retrievable. All other weeks have title only from index. IMPORTANT: Demos are POC/experiments - NOT guaranteed releases. Cross-reference with omni_changelog.json to determine what shipped.
meta.important_note: Demos highlight what Omni is working on or experimenting with, but are NOT a guarantee of release. Cross-reference with omni_changelog.json to determine what actually shipped.
meta.query_tips: To check if a demo shipped: search omni_changelog.json for same feature keywords after the demo date. Gap between demo date and changelog date = development time. Demos with NO changelog match = not yet shipped or cancelled.

weeks_detail.summary: Blobby Joins the Modeling Team: Blobby follows you around the IDE and can intervene to build model (in branches). Goal is extreme productivity - automating formats on 100s of fields, descriptions, SQL building. Developers can review before accepting. Omni as MCP server: folks can integrate Blobby into external MCP use cases, bringing Omni goodness to any AI workflow. AI in All Views and Fields. Visual Drilling. New Dashboard Search.

demos.title: Blobby Learns New LLMs (BYOLLM)
demos.description: Open up different LLM providers: ChatGPT, Gemini, BYO. Admin controls for orgs that want it.
demos.author: Gustav Staprans

demos.title: AI Slash Commands
demos.description: Power users can direct Blobby explicitly to different skills: agentic querying, visualization, summarization, field building, calculation.
demos.author: Jamie Davidson

demos.title: Deep Thinking UX Improvements
demos.description: Streaming chat experience tuned to hide less important steps while showing full train of thought when needed.
demos.author: Gustav Staprans

demos.title: Blobby Voice App
demos.description: Early DIY project to open up voice with Blobby. Early days to open up imagination for what's possible.
demos.author: Will Savage

demos.title: SQL Totals
demos.description: Bringing front-end totals experience to SQL queries (sum, count, average, etc down a column).
demos.author: Steven Talbot

demos.title: Duration Fields
demos.description: A couple clicks to build duration fields in the UI with model pushdown when needed.
demos.author: TJ Banghart

demos.title: Range Calc Pushdown
demos.description: Full range calculations (SUM(B:B), AVERAGE(C:C), etc) pushed down using LOD fields. Trivial comparison fields in UI, robust data model when needed.
demos.author: TJ Banghart

demos.title: Top N Filter Escaping
demos.description: New toggles with Top N to ignore/include filters for comparison to population at large.
demos.author: TJ Banghart

demos.title: Tabs Beta Launch
demos.description: End-to-end demo of new tabs (pages) experience for dashboards. Beta out now.
demos.author: Luke Bowerman

demos.title: Cross-Filtering (Very Alpha)
demos.description: First look at cross-filterable dashboards. UX considerations around native filters vs cross-filters.
demos.author: Steven Talbot

demos.title: Bulk Dashboard Filter Mapping
demos.description: Map a filter to 40 tiles at once. Bulk mapping experience alongside in-line UX.
demos.author: Alisa Tatarinova

demos.title: Field Picker Views In Use
demos.description: Toggle between specific fields in use or views in use - most helpful in gigantic topics.
demos.author: Luke Bowerman

demos.title: Workbook Tab Organization
demos.description: Organize workbook tabs by type, name, etc.
demos.author: Luke Bowerman

demos.title: Query Snowflake Semantic Views
demos.description: Query Snowflake semantic views directly in Omni. Translators back and forth for native experience.

demos.title: Custom Blobby Builder
demos.description: Build your own Blobby avatar using the custom Blobby builder.

demos.title: Sankey Charts (Early Look)
demos.description: Early look at Sankey charts as part of expanding native visualization options.

demos.title: Live-Updating Queries Page
demos.description: Queries page live-updates to actively track and manage database usage from Omni.

demos.title: dbt Integration in Azure
demos.description: dbt integration up and running in Azure - progress getting full app available in Azure.

weeks_detail.summary: 22 demos: New pie chart with percentage calculations, optional totals, better labeling. Query cancellation (select some/all running queries). Azure scheduler demo. Native field masking gestures. Snowflake Semantic Views export (push Omni model backwards into Snowflake). Warning for unsaved SQL. Comma-delimited dashboard sharing. Tag display improvements. Feature flag management UI. Dashboard zoom (% zoom for layout control). Filter position/sizing control (complete control over filter positions). Drag dashboards into folders. UX pack: measure groups unfurl on search, SQL auto-complete, code folding, markdown editor. Download APIs for app builders. Custom Blobby emojis/avatars (custom avatars in core app, groundwork for BYO emojis).

Conditional formatting text color intelligence for light/dark mode. Faster pivots over large datasets with fill. Scheduler bursting for significantly more scale in sharing. Clearer content permissions inheritance from parent folders. Easier field dragging into SQL editor. Dynamic stack ordering for stacked charts (second most requested feature). Deep research getting ready for everyone (Blobby multi-stage analysis plans). Topic-scoped fields wired to UI. Better search for massive schemas.

AI layer for summarizing/analyzing results of many queries on a dashboard. Custom empty/error messages for dashboard tiles. Dashboard localization (more languages, embedded use cases). Dashboard construction overhaul QOL - managing and deleting tiles. Map dashboard filters to calculations. Dashboard fully served out of cubing layer (instant slice and dice). Handling AI summaries when feature is disabled. Custom permissions getting close - handling duplication and resolution between permission groupings. eCharts pie chart testing (replacing Vega for pies). Embed tuning: disable right-click actions, URL-encoded markdown, plus one more.

AI field creation: build fields directly from AI query (on-the-fly aggregates, derivative dimensions). AI MCP v0: Blobby in Goose and generic AI functions - data accessible from any chat service. Streaming AI results: Blobby tells you what it's doing while doing it. Level of detail calculations: escape or force grouping independent of the rest of the query (dynamic percent of totals, comparison to unfiltered data). Dashboard tile sizing improvements. Force expose long filter lists beyond default single line. Aggregate directly from visualization when data isn't at right grain.

AI Mode launch (finishing touches, linking to workbook pages). Early Slack experience for Blobby. Training inside topic with example queries. Embed navigation custom experience and custom filters outside iframe. User-specific models / model localization work. API exposure ongoing. Branch management and modeling demos. Unnesting data complex aggregation tooling. Snowflake key-pair auth for DB connections. Custom vis library (12 visualization libraries via vibe code). Subtotal visualization polish. Spider/radar chart custom vis. Business growth visualization example.
